get.description:
Performs a custom action on an invoice.
     *
     *        The current range of actions are as follows
     *        - clone_to_invoice
     *        - clone_to_quote
     *        - history
     *        - delivery_note
     *        - mark_paid
     *        - download
     *        - archive
     *        - delete
     *        - email

items.description: Array of hashed IDs to be bulk 'actioned

id.description: The id field of the activity

updated_at.description: Unixtimestamp the last time the record was updated

is_system.description: Defines is the activity was performed by the system

token_id.description: The hashed ID of the token who performed the action

ip.description: The IP Address of the user who performed the action

operator.description: The operator flag of the search

bank_account_status.description: The status of the bank account

balance.description: The current bank balance if available

transaction_id.description: The id of the transaction rule

currency_id.description: The currency ID of the currency

bank_account_id.description: The ID number of the bank account

id.description: The bank transaction rules hashed id

rules.description: A mapped collection of the sub rules for the BankTransactionRule

auto_convert.description: Flags whether the rule converts the transaction automatically

matches_on_all.description: Flags whether all subrules are required for the match

applies_to.description: Flags whether the rule applies to a CREDIT or DEBIT

frequency_id.description: integer const representation of the frequency

id.description: The hashed if of the contact

user_id.description: The hashed id of the user who created the contact

company_id.description: The hashed id of the company

client_id.description: The hashed id of the client

first_name.description: The first name of the contact

last_name.description: The last name of the contact

phone.description: The phone number of the contact

accepted_terms_version.description: The terms of service which the contact has accpeted

password.description: The hashed password of the contact

confirmation-code.description: The confirmation code used to authenticate the contacts email address

is_primary.description: Defines is this contact is the primary contact for the client

confirmed.description: Boolean value confirms the user has confirmed their account.

is_locked.description: Boolean value defines if the contact has been locked out.

send_email.description: Boolean value determines is this contact should receive emails

failed_logins.description: The number of failed logins the contact has had

email_verified_at.description: The date which the contact confirmed their email

id.description: The hashed id of the client gateway token

is_default.description: Flag determining if the token is the default payment method

user_id.description: The hashed id of the user

industry_id.description: The industry id of the client

size_id.description: The size id of the client

is_deleted.description: Boolean flagged determining if the client has been deleted

paid_to_date.description: The amount the client has paid to date.

credit_balance.description: An amount which is available to the client for future use.

id.description: The hashed id of the company gateway

require_billing_address.description: Determines if the the billing address is required prior to payment.

require_shipping_address.description: Determines if the the billing address is required prior to payment.

config.description: The configuration map for the gateway

update_details.description: Determines if the client details should be updated.

fees_and_limits.description: A mapped collection of the fees and limits for the configured gateway

entity_id.description: This field will reference one of the following entity hashed ID payment_id, invoice_id or credit_id

notes.description: The notes which reference this entry of the ledger

adjustment.description: The amount the client balance is adjusted by

portal_mode.description: Determines the client facing urls ie: subdomain,domain,iframe

subdomain.description: Specifies the first part of the company domain ie acme in acme.domain.com

portal_domain.description: The fully qualified domain for client facing URLS

enabled_tax_rates.description: Number of taxes rates used per entity

fill_products.description: Toggles filling a product description based on product key

update_products.description: Toggles updating a product description which description changes

show_product_details.description: Toggles showing a product description which description changes

enable_product_cost.description: Show/Hide the product cost field in the UI

enable_product_quantity.description: Show/hide the product quantity field (used in the UI to show the default quantity)

default_quantity.description: Enable/Disable whether to use a default quantity

custom_surcharge_taxes1.description: Toggles charging taxes on custom surcharge amounts

custom_surcharge_taxes2.description: Toggles charging taxes on custom surcharge amounts

custom_surcharge_taxes3.description: Toggles charging taxes on custom surcharge amounts

custom_surcharge_taxes4.description: Toggles charging taxes on custom surcharge amounts

show_currency_code.description: Toggles whether the currency symbol or code is shown

payment_terms.description: -1 sets no payment term, 0 sets payment due immediately, positive integers indicates payment terms in days

company_gateway_ids.description: A commad separate list of available gateways

enable_client_portal_tasks.description: Show/hide the tasks panel in the client portal

bcc_email.description: A comma separate list of BCC emails

pdf_email_attachment.description: Toggles whether to attach PDF as attachment

ubl_email_attachment.description: Toggles whether to attach UBL as attachment

counter_number_applied.description: enum when the invoice number counter is set, ie when_saved, when_sent, when_paid

quote_number_applied.description: enum when the quote number counter is set, ie when_saved, when_sent

custom_message_dashboard.description: A custom message which is displayed on the dashboard

custom_message_unpaid_invoice.description: A custom message which is displayed in the client portal when a client is viewing a unpaid invoice.

custom_message_paid_invoice.description: A custom message which is displayed in the client portal when a client is viewing a paid invoice.

custom_message_unapproved_quote.description: A custom message which is displayed in the client portal when a client is viewing a unapproved quote.

lock_invoices.description: Toggles whether invoices are locked once sent and cannot be modified further

auto_archive_invoice.description: Toggles whether a invoice is archived immediately following payment

auto_archive_quote.description: Toggles whether a quote is archived after being converted to a invoice

auto_convert_quote.description: Toggles whether a quote is converted to a invoice when approved

inclusive_taxes.description: Boolean flag determining whether inclusive or exclusive taxes are used

task_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the task number pattern

reminder_send_time.description: Time from UTC +0 when the email will be sent to the client

shared_invoice_quote_counter.description: Flags whether to share the counter for invoices and quotes

fill_products.description: Automatically fill products based on product_key
